title: DCS 20 Large Microfibre Cloth 40x40cm – Super Soft Microfibre Cleaning Cloths for Kitchen, Bathrooms, Mirrors, Motorbike, Car Cleaning - Streak Free Washable Cloths to Clean Surfaces -10Blue & 10Pink
features: Ultra soft cleaning cloth that is Scratch free - Ultra soft and highly absorbent microfibre cleaning cloths, great for cleaning windows, kitchenware, cars or other delicate surfaces.

Very absorbent ultra fine and lint free- Made of 80% Polyester, 20% Polyamide. Our non-abrasive cleaning cloths can absorb seven times their weight in water, making them perfect for quickly soaking up water from the countertop and tables without leaving lint or streaks behind. Clean or polish with or without water. Our microfibre cloths will leave your home sparkling on worktops, appliances, kitchens, bathrooms, mirrors or vehicles.

Tackle and cleaning jobs - Our premium kitchen cloths are large at 40x40 cm, making them perfect for removing grease and particles from dishes, oven tops, pots or pans and great for polishing surfaces to remove fingermarks from sink taps to your silverware or glassware. Making your home look shiny and spotless

Reusable & long-lasting, trusted by professionals - Our car cleaning cloths are large, 40x40cm, allowing you to fold them and still fit your hand. They feature high-quality stitching with reinforced edges, making them designed to last so they can be washed repeatedly and not lose quality. Our cloths are lightweight, and they are super absorbent because they contain 20% Polyamide. They can absorb seven times their weight in water.
Can be used at the office, home, workplace and even for industrial and professional use - These cloths to clean surfaces work hard for you collecting dirt from any surface.
description: Our microfiber cleaning cloth is here to revolutionize the way you clean. This isn't your average cleaning cloth; it's a cleaning powerhouse. Why Choose Our Microfiber Cleaning Cloth? Streak-Free Shine: Bid farewell to unsightly streaks and smears on your surfaces. Our microfiber cloth works like a charm, leaving your windows, glassware, and stainless steel appliances gleaming. Versatile Wonder: One cloth, endless possibilities. This microfiber marvel does everything from dusting delicate surfaces to polishing your car's exterior. Simplify your cleaning routine and get more done with less effort. Pro-Grade Quality: Trusted by professionals, our cleaning cloths boast premium quality designed to last. Experience the difference with a cloth that won't wear out, tear, or lose effectiveness over time. Luxuriously Soft: Pamper your surfaces with its gentle touch, ensuring they remain scratch-free and pristine. Super Absorbent: Our cleaning microfibre cloths can absorb up to seven times its weight in water, making it perfect for tackling spills, messes, and drying tasks around your home. Say goodbye to subpar cleaning products that only add to your frustration. Our soft cloths for cleaning are your ticket to a cleaner, shinier, and more enjoyable cleaning experience. Please don't settle for less when it comes to cleanliness and shine. Upgrade to the ultimate cleaning companion today and discover a world where cleaning is a breeze. Make your surfaces sparkle effortlessly with our heavy duty microfibre cloths - your home's new best friend. Grab yours now and experience the cleaning revolution!
